entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
